verbs.description: [V: arrested] [ARGM-TMP: while naked on couch in alley smile] it not everyday a police officer in a boston suburb spends a weekday night waking up naked twentysomethings asleep on a couch in an alleyway but according to arlington police that just what happened on wednesday evening in the normally quiet boston suburb and by normally quiet we mean except for that time this winter … ryan barry arlington frederick ryan nicole carmichael boston
